short_summary: Aviation Replacement Parts for the choinuk. FINAL COST: NOTE - CAT -545,60 31 :63
description: Aviation replacement parts for the chinook. The goods being required and listed below are for repair and replacement of aircraft avionics components and subassemblies. Bids cover 5 year mandate 2023-2028 a start date of sept 20/2023, with a proposal deadline of december 20 2024, a 5- year extension can be added to determine who would take over the SA , and manage the payments to certifying agencies. Proportionality will be judged by the SA Authority keeping in mind, public good service's growth and negotiating compelling conditions for each competing party into this bnd,
